hero.core_tension: Choose narrow, targeted offers to protect AOV or launch broad sitewide cuts that drive traffic but erode margin.
hero.setting: Operations war room overlooking a busy store entrance and an in-store media wall; printed heatmaps on the table.
hero.action: Pointing to a split board and placing a 'threshold bundles' card into the chosen column.
hero.urgency_symbol: A folded calendar with Nov 19 highlighted and a small mechanical countdown timer on the table.
props: A small stack of shelf-tags labeled 'loyalty-only guarantee'
A dashboard tablet showing early-window share %
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on the operator and soft falloff on background activity.
hero.alt: Head of Retail choosing targeted thresholds to lift early-window share

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings for time windows with radial bars; inner ring annotated 12-15% (current) and outer ring 20-30% (goal); two embedded bar arcs show footfall uplift bands and event CPA ceiling.
elements: Small tokens for cohort segments (zip income, last-30-day spend)
QR nodes on the outer ring representing in-store media activations
signal_map.motion: Arcs flow from outer media nodes to inner purchase ring. Radial bars animate growth from baseline to target bands to make the measurement spine obvious.
signal_map.palette: Neutral paper textures with deep blue for baseline, bright green for target bands, and amber for activation nodes.
signal_map.alt: CMO reviewing rings showing early_window_share and footfall_lift targets

case_studies.scene: A compact endcap in a store staged for a threshold-bundle test. Narrow signage calls out a time-limited staples bundle for loyalty members.
case_studies.moment: A floor manager applies a 'loyalty-only guarantee' shelf tag while a small clipboard shows cohort targets by zip income.
props: Endcap signage reading 'Threshold bundle: Spend $30 get $8 off'
Clipboard with cohort lists and AOV baseline
Printed note referencing 'Targeted thresholds protect margin'
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial key light on the bundle and soft ambient to keep background readable.
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships measuring threshold bundle impact on early-window share

case_studies.scene: A store-as-studio test: a media screen cycles time-limited staples creative with a QR tag. A tablet shows live scan counts mapped to store doors.
case_studies.moment: Property lead taps a cell on the tablet to isolate a test vs control map while a customer scans the QR at entrance.
props: In-store media screen with QR and 'Nov 191 Dec 03' callout
Tablet with real-time QR redemption map
Poster that references 'instrument cohort early-window share' at the bottom
case_studies.lighting: Warm backlight on screen with a crisp rim on the operator to emphasize collaboration.
case_studies.alt: Head of Property running QR footfall test and measuring redemption
